metadata.title: Gifts for Men Who Have Everything, Personalized Pocket Watch for Birthday Valentines Day Graduation Fathers Day Christmas Stockings
features: 【Inspirational Gifts for son】Roman numerals pocket watch with exquisite pattern is beautifully crafted with inspirational saying for sons.

【Best Son Gifts】 to my son pocket watch, gifts for son from mom, son in law gifts, son gifts from dad, Christmas gifts, xmas gifts, birthday gift ideas, graduation gifts, son gifts on wedding day, Valentines Day gifts, Fathers Day gifts, bday gifts, holiday gifts, Christmas stocking stuffers for sons.

【You Can Get】1* pocket watch, 1*necklace chain, 1*pocket chain, 1*instruction card , 1* quality gift box. Each watch is individually crafted and carefully packaged in a durable gift box, perfect for gift giving at any time.
【Premium Quality】 Premium zinc alloy metal with the shiny black. Full hunter flip case-double sided polishing in smooth. White dial with filigreed hour, minute, and second hands.
【Easy to Use】 Precision quartz movement- setting time easily and press button to open the watch.
description: LEVONTA has copyright of the original design and is the unique authorized seller on Amazon. Please pay attention to avoid purchasing counterfeits from others.
♦1 x pocket watch (diameter: 1.8” / 4.5cm) ♦1 x necklace chain (length approx 15.7” / 40cm) ♦1 x pocket chain ♦1x quality gift box ♦1 x instruction card ♦1 x thank you card
★Item type: roman numerals pocket watch with exquisite pattern  ★Color: shiny black  ★Case material: alloy  ★Chain material: alloy  ★Net weight: 1.86oz / 53g

♦Once you receive the pocket watch, please peel off the plastic protective film on the surface of the watch.  ♦Press the crown at the top of watch, the front plate will open.  ♦Setting time: pull the crown away from the base of the watch and turn the crown clockwise until reaching the exact time. Then push the crown back.

Surprise him with the unique gift and melt his heart on any special occasion: wedding anniversary, birthday, Valentine’s Day, Easter, graduation, Father’s Day, Christmas, Wedding day, New Year, Thanksgiving!
